description: This file defines React components for authentication modals, including API Key and OAuth authentication flows, as well as a combined controller component. It manages user input, initiates authentication requests, and displays relevant UI elements for user interaction.

methods.name: AuthModals
methods.description: Main component that renders API Key and OAuth modals based on the 'open' prop.

methods.name: ModalShell
methods.description: Reusable modal container component that displays a modal dialog with a title and children content.

methods.name: ApiKeyModal
methods.description: Component for API Key authentication, handling user input and submitting credentials.

methods.name: OAuthModal
methods.description: Component for OAuth authentication flow, initiating OAuth process and providing link to authorization URL.
